title: AI Engineer / Artificial Intelligence Developer
description: An AI Engineer develops, trains, and deploys artificial intelligence models and systems, leveraging machine learning, data science, and software engineering to build intelligent applications.

steps.title: Deploy an AI Model
steps.detail: Host and serve an AI model in production.

steps.title: End-to-End AI Application
steps.detail: From data to deployment with monitoring.

title: AI Prompt Engineer
description: An AI Prompt Engineer specializes in designing, testing, and optimizing prompts for AI language models and generative systems to generate accurate, relevant, and effective outputs tailored to diverse applications.

steps.title: Domain-Specific Prompt Engineering
steps.detail: Customization for fields like legal, medical.

steps.title: Custom Prompt Pipeline
steps.detail: Build a modular prompt system for an application.

steps.title: Ethical Prompting Framework
steps.detail: Develop ethical guidelines and testing strategies.

steps.title: Deploy Prompt-Driven Application
steps.detail: Build and deploy a real-world prompt system.

title: Animator
description: An Animator creates motion graphics, character animations, and visual effects for film, games, advertising, and digital platforms, combining technical skills and creative storytelling from concept to final render.

steps.title: Animated Character Project
steps.detail: Design and animate a character scene.

steps.title: Motion Graphics Project
steps.detail: Create an animated ad or explainer.

title: AR/VR Developer
description: An AR/VR Developer designs and implements immersive augmented and virtual reality experiences, integrating 3D content, spatial computing, and interactive user interfaces across hardware platforms.

steps.title: Programming Fundamentals
steps.detail: C# or C++ basics, syntax, control structures.

steps.title: Simple AR/VR Scene
steps.detail: Build an interactive AR or VR scene.

steps.title: Performance Optimization
steps.detail: Level of detail, frame rate tuning.

steps.title: Cloud Services & Backend
steps.detail: Data syncing, cloud anchors, realtime DB.

title: Backend Developer
description: A Backend Developer designs, builds, and maintains the server-side logic, APIs, databases, and infrastructure that power web and mobile applications, focusing on reliability, performance, and security.

steps.title: Programming Fundamentals
steps.detail: Variables, data types, conditionals, loops, functions.

steps.title: Git & Version Control
steps.detail: Branches, merges, pull requests, GitHub workflow.

steps.title: Linux & Command Line
steps.detail: Filesystem, basic commands, SSH, environment variables.

steps.title: HTTP & Web Fundamentals
steps.detail: Requests, responses, methods, status codes, headers.

steps.title: Node.js Runtime
steps.detail: Event loop, modules, npm, basics of Node apps.

steps.title: API Testing with Tools
steps.detail: Using Postman/Insomnia to design and debug APIs.

steps.title: SQL & Relational Databases
steps.detail: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, joins, indexes.

steps.title: Authentication & Authorization
steps.detail: Sessions, JWT, OAuth basics, password hashing.

steps.title: Backend Security
steps.detail: OWASP Top 10, input sanitization, secure headers.

steps.title: Backend Testing
steps.detail: Unit tests, integration tests, test doubles.

steps.title: File Storage & Uploads
steps.detail: Object storage (S3), presigned URLs, CDN basics.

steps.title: Backend Design Patterns
steps.detail: Layered architecture, repository pattern, dependency injection.

steps.title: Configuration & Environments
steps.detail: Env files, secrets, staging vs production.

steps.title: Deploying to the Cloud
steps.detail: Deploy to services like Render, Railway, AWS, or similar.

steps.title: CI/CD for Backend
steps.detail: GitHub Actions, pipelines, tests on push.

steps.title: Scaling APIs
steps.detail: Horizontal scaling, load balancing, rate limiting.

steps.title: Build a Production-Ready API
steps.detail: Design, build, test, and deploy a real backend for a web or mobile app.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: A Blockchain Developer designs, develops, and maintains blockchain-based systems, including cryptocurrencies, smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and distributed ledgers for various industries.

steps.title: Smart Contract Project
steps.detail: Deploy a token or DeFi contract.

steps.title: DeFi dApp
steps.detail: Create a lending or staking platform.

steps.title: Full-Scale Blockchain Application
steps.detail: Build and deploy a complete blockchain system.

steps.title: Capstone Blockchain Project
steps.detail: Design, develop, and deploy a full blockchain solution.

title: Business Analyst
description: A Business Analyst identifies business needs, analyzes processes and data, and facilitates communication between stakeholders to propose effective solutions that drive organizational success.

steps.title: Conduct a Requirements Workshop
steps.detail: Identify and document requirements for a sample case.

steps.title: Model a Business Process
steps.detail: Map and optimize a simple business process.

steps.title: Use Case & User Story Writing
steps.detail: Creating effective user stories and acceptance criteria.

steps.title: Sprint Planning & User Story Workshop
steps.detail: Create user stories and plan sprints.

steps.title: Process Improvement Plan
steps.detail: Develop and present a process improvement.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: A Cloud Engineer designs, implements, and manages cloud-based infrastructure and services, ensuring high availability, scalability, and security for applications and data across cloud platforms.

steps.title: Deploy Containerized App
steps.detail: Use Kubernetes and secure cloud resources.

steps.title: Design Cloud Infrastructure
steps.detail: Design and document cloud infrastructure for a use case.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: A Cybersecurity Analyst monitors, detects, and responds to cyber threats and vulnerabilities, implementing security measures to protect the organizations data and infrastructure.

title: Data Analyst
description: A Data Analyst collects, processes, and performs statistical analyses on data sets to help organizations make informed business decisions through actionable insights and reporting.

steps.title: Data Cleaning Fundamentals
steps.detail: Handling missing values, data types, duplicates.

steps.title: Monthly Sales Report
steps.detail: Extract, analyze, and visualize sales data.

steps.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
steps.detail: Segment customers based on behavior data.

title: Data Scientist
description: A Data Scientist analyzes large datasets to extract insights, build predictive models, and support data-driven decision-making, combining skills in statistics, programming, and domain knowledge.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: A DevOps Engineer streamlines software development and deployment processes through automation, infrastructure as code, continuous integration/delivery, and system monitoring to ensure scalable and reliable applications.

steps.title: Cloud Computing Basics
steps.detail: AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud intro.

steps.title: Collaboration & Communication
steps.detail: Working with Dev, QA, Ops teams.

steps.title: End-to-End DevOps Project
steps.detail: Complete CI/CD with monitoring and scaling.

steps.title: Continuous Learning & Industry Trends
steps.detail: New tools, cloud innovations, best practices.

title: Digital Marketer
description: A Digital Marketer creates, implements, and optimizes online marketing campaigns across multiple channels such as social media, search engines, email, and display advertising to drive brand growth and conversions.

steps.title: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
steps.detail: Overview of digital channels and concepts.

steps.title: Develop a Brand Awareness Strategy
steps.detail: Plan and execute for brand growth.

title: Embedded Systems Engineer
description: An Embedded Systems Engineer designs, develops, and maintains hardware and software integrated systems used in devices like automotive controls, IoT devices, robotics, and consumer electronics.

steps.title: Communication Protocols
steps.detail: SPI, I2C, UART basics and implementation.

steps.title: Hardware-Software Integration Project
steps.detail: Develop a sensor interface with firmware.

steps.title: Capstone Project
steps.detail: Complete embedded system from concept to prototype.

title: Fashion Designer
description: A Fashion Designer creates original clothing, accessories, and footwear designs, blending creativity with material knowledge to deliver collections for brands or clients, from concept sketches to final production.

steps.title: Sewing Techniques
steps.detail: Hand and machine sewing, seams, finishing.

steps.title: Collection Mini Project
steps.detail: Design & illustrate a small apparel collection.

title: Frontend Developer
description: A Frontend Developer builds the visual and interactive parts of websites and web applications, focusing on usability, accessibility, and performance.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: A Full-Stack Developer designs, develops, and maintains both client-side and server-side applications, integrating databases, APIs, and UI/UX to deliver complete, scalable software solutions.

courses.title: The Complete Full-Stack Web Developer in 2025
Full Stack Web Development with React and Node

title: Game Developer
description: A Game Developer designs and builds interactive games for platforms including PC, consoles, mobile, and VR, combining programming, design, and storytelling skills throughout the game development lifecycle.

steps.detail: C++, C#, Java basics, syntax, logic.

steps.title: Intro to Game Engines

title: Graphic Designer
description: A Graphic Designer creates visual content for digital and print media, collaborating with teams to deliver engaging, effective designs that communicate messages and enhance brand identity.

steps.title: Portfolio Project 1
steps.detail: Design and present a real-world client project.

title: Illustrator / Concept Artist
description: An Illustrator or Concept Artist creates imaginative visual concepts for games, movies, animation, and publishing, designing characters, environments, and assets from initial sketch to polished art.

steps.title: Portfolio Project 1
steps.detail: Create a character and environment concept.

steps.title: Portfolio Project 2
steps.detail: Full concept scene for a game or film.

title: Interior Designer
description: An Interior Designer plans and creates functional, aesthetically pleasing indoor spaces for homes, offices, and public environments, balancing creativity, client needs, and technical requirements from concept to completion.

title: IT Support / Helpdesk Engineer
description: An IT Support / Helpdesk Engineer provides technical assistance and support for computer systems, software, and networks, helping users resolve hardware and software issues efficiently while managing IT infrastructure.

steps.title: Automate Common Tasks

steps.detail: Create security layers and respond to threats.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: A Machine Learning Engineer develops, tests, and maintains machine learning models and pipelines, focusing on scalable systems and applying algorithmic solutions to real-world problems.

steps.title: Programming Foundations

steps.title: End-to-End ML Pipeline
steps.detail: Build a full ML pipeline on a dataset.

steps.detail: Train and evaluate a deep model.

steps.title: Deploy a Machine Learning Model
steps.detail: Host and monitor a ML model in production.

steps.title: Advanced Machine Learning System
steps.detail: Develop an end-to-end system with monitoring.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: A Mobile App Developer designs, develops, tests, and maintains applications for mobile devices on platforms such as iOS and Android, ensuring usability, performance, and responsiveness.

requiredSkills.name: Programming (Swift for iOS, Kotlin/Java for Android)

steps.detail: Swift for iOS or Kotlin/Java for Android.

steps.title: Basic Mobile App

steps.title: Testing & Debugging
steps.detail: Unit tests, UI tests, crash reporting.

steps.detail: Build complex app with CI/CD workflow.

steps.title: Stay Updated on Mobile Trends
steps.detail: New devices, OS features, development tools.

title: Product Manager
description: A Product Manager leads product development from conception to launch, aligning business goals with customer needs, managing cross-functional teams, and ensuring the product's success in the market.

steps.title: Product Development Plan
steps.detail: Create a full product strategy and roadmap document.

steps.title: Launch & Feedback Campaign
steps.detail: Execute a product launch and analyze results.

steps.title: Growth & Expansion Plan
steps.detail: Develop a plan for scaling a product in a new market.

steps.title: End-to-End Product Launch
steps.detail: Lead a product from concept to launch.

title: QA / Test Engineer
description: A QA / Test Engineer designs, develops, and executes test plans to ensure software quality, identifying bugs and verifying features through manual and automated testing approaches.

steps.detail: Write and execute test plans manually.

steps.detail: Automate test suites for web applications.

title: SEO Specialist
description: An SEO Specialist optimizes websites and content to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic, using technical, on-page, and off-page SEO strategies informed by analytics and industry trends.

steps.detail: Analyze & improve a live SEO campaign.

title: Social Media Manager
description: A Social Media Manager develops, implements, and manages social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement, and conversions across platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

steps.detail: Plan and execute a multi-platform campaign.

steps.detail: Plan and execute social launch for a brand.
